title: Vaccination in the Work of Rudolf Steiner
author: Daniel
cleaned_text: As the pandemic has progressed, the question of vaccination has become very relevant. So I put together a book that includes everything [Rudolf Steiner](http://rudolfsteinerweb.com) said about vaccines. It is called [Vaccination in the Work of Rudolf Steiner](https://www.aelzina.com/vaccination-in-the-work-of-rudolf-steiner/ork-of-rudolf-steiner/). It is available directly from [Aelzina Books](https://www.aelzina.com), or on Amazon as a paperback or a Kindle edition.
